name: Retro Baby
description:
This is an old personal project I made for my game programming diploma back in 2020. Its a 3D racing game that focus on immersive yourself with the drifting and the cool music in the background

Music name are:

  • Resonance - Home
  • Hydrogen - M O O N
  • Bloodline - Moon
